entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
